content.detailedDescription: I was selling lemonade at the lake. i saw the orbs first.When i first saw the object, i thought it was a drone.It looked like a disc with an added section above it. this was followed by two orbs that emitted red and green light. one orb emitted green light the other, red. it flew over the lake and then disappeared.I felt scared when i saw it. i told my parents about what i saw. i lost sight when it disappeared.
content.summary: Saw disk with an attached part with widows and followed by two orbs

content.detailedDescription: I had just purchased a new flir e5  camera for ufo and other sightings there came a storm with funny clouds,  have allot here.  started snapping shots around and caught these lights. thought you might like to see them.  been having quite a few strange storm's here lately thought this would be a good try out with the cam..
content.summary: Flur sighting in a storm over elmore county

content.detailedDescription: During a small fireworks show off in the distance of our backyard, we saw an object appear in the sky out of nowhere. we saw red and blue lights on this object and quickly dismissed it as a plane. it rose halfway up the horizon, then suddenly stopped for 10 seconds then slowly sunk down then quickly shot backwards and disappeared from our sight. my dad, and mom and i all saw the same thing at the same time and commented on it. it was very strange.
content.summary: Light in sky rose then fell in same path-not a firework or plane

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in a back yard around 9pm est noticed a five glowing objects travel in a line from south to east. objects were brightly glowing and appeared to be spheres. the sighting was witnessed by a total of six people.
content.summary: Five unknown objects flew in a line

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving toward the manasquan inlet when i observed a hovering pulsating white and red light on an oval shaped object against the darkening sky. the object was stationary and it looked very unusual it was oval-shaped against darkening background suddenly the object disappeared.

i was confused by what i saw. i pointed it out to others and they agreed that was wierd. after the object disappeared someone suggested that it should be reported to mufon.
content.summary: Stationary pulsating red and white light. hovering then  disappeared suddenly

content.detailedDescription:
Aug. 15 2014
spokane, wa 99208

friends, wife, and i were just finishing up a bbq around 7:45 pm pacific time. i had noticed a green flash go across the horizon and disappear behind some trees, i asked if anyone else had seen it and they replied no.  about 15 minutes went by and my wife asked "is that what you saw?" i looked over towards the north where i had seen the flash, and the same object was there, but this time it was hovering in one place. i told everyone to look for a camera or pull out a cell phone. my wife grabbed her phone and started filming. at first we thought it was a drone toy, however this appeared to be at the smallest 10 feet wide, then we thought helicopter until the light started moving unlike any man made craft we had ever seen, moving vertical, horizontal, and making 180 break neck turns and then descending towards the ground. it was a glowing green orb like craft with reddish orange pulsating light. all of us were stumped about the situation. drone? i have never seen one this large and move so precise that was under control by humans. we lost sight as it descended behind a tree line.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Green orb like ufo hovering and performing movents that a man made craft should not make.

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:30 pm and my husband was late from getting home from work so i stepped out onto the deck to see if i could see him coming down the road when i noticed to the right hand side of the roads on top of the range of mountains 2 small lights and a large light in the center just hovering over the mountain. it didn't move and i kept trying to focus on it and finally decided to get my binoculars to try and make it out, just as i got back outside and raised the glasses to my eyes the lights merged together into one big ball of swirling lights of red,blue and white mist with small pin sized lines shooting through the middle. once they had merged they suddenly disappeared leaving no trace.
content.summary: Observed 2 small lights and a larger one in the middle hovering over the mountains in front of my house.

content.detailedDescription:
Situated high in the hills over looking the coast i observed 3 objects that appeared to decend to the ground just south of town. have seen many of our own planes and helicopters in infrared and know the flight paths very well, these objects didnot conform to any path seen before. could not see them with the naked eye. the area they appered to decend on was a semi remote part of the coast. 
night footage taken around the same day with a medion scope. these object are very large and bright as hell. 
i have notice a huge increase in activity around here, might say its a bit of a ufo flap.
some sightings happen quickly and not enough time for the camera, \\
hope you enjoy the footage
heads up people
regards drew
content.summary: 3 objects decended from above clouds, one seemed to hover for a moment and the other 2 followed the coast line then seemed to slowly touch down. the camera was a modified infrared sony evi. the other footage at night of various light orbs

content.detailedDescription: I took this photo aug 10,2014 on my way home from red bluff ca. headed northbound on i-5. i didn't notice the light at the time. shortly after exiting the freeway headed west, i noticed an unusual light in the sky, but lost sight of it. i noticed while tranfering photos from phone to pc that the date on photos i took on my way home were dated aug 11th. all the other photos i took earlier that day were dated aug 10th. i checked time and date on phone, it was correct. i checked time and date on pc, it was also correct.
content.summary: Found this photo uploading pics from my phone to pc

content.detailedDescription:
We were swimming in the sea on holiday and saw a coin like thing in the sky. dark grey. could not work out what it was as it flew from side to side and seemed to "flip" one side to the other, which made us think it could not be wind current as never seen a kite fly like that. it ascended..Descended and went straight but never at speed. airport was near and it was lower than the flight path descending. was not a kite. want to know what it was. we noticed as was circular and flying odd. lost sight when it seemed to come nearer the bay and off the horizon. i lost sight when it seemed level with the mountain/ hills opposite palma bay. what was this? there is an airport just near...So presumably it would have been on radar?
feelings....Skeptical...Was something going on we didn't know about...But also same time we know what we saw and never seen anything fly like that. was not how we wouldhave expected a ufo to fly or look like
content.summary: Circular ufo daytime palma mallorca

content.detailedDescription: Bright sphere we had seen earlier came back over us. this time it came  from the north and veered off to the west. there was no sound. my husband took pics with his phone which flashed as he took the picture. suddenly the object flashes back a single flash and the brightness of the sphere disappeared. within a second or two i immediately saw another flash to the direct left of the object which must have been at least a half mile maybe because of the high altitude. at that time two tiny star like objects were seen and i can't be certain but it appeared like there were some tinier star like objects springing from the second larger object that then appeared to go into the middle of that. we looked at our pictures after but nothing came up except for the shadow outline of a very large rectangle which we had noticed on one of the pictures we had taken earlier  that night.
content.summary: Bright sphere we had seen earlier came back over us this time from the north. possibly 2 objects this time.  changed direction a d disappeared upwards.

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a  meal outside on the balcony  of the breakwater bistro, brixham in the evening. i noticed a  vertical rainbow effect in the sky, so i took a photograph. i noticed a dark shape appear so i took another picture .  i first thought the dark object was a small cloud, but there are no other dark clouds in the sky, and it had a strange shape. the sun was off to the right. it didn't feel right and i joked about the cloud being a ufo to my husband. thre object disappeared. i was watching it intermittently over around 10 mins. when i saw the photo i decided to let you have a look.
we did not draw other peoples attention to it as we were in a restaurant and hubby said it was a black cloud.
content.summary: Ufo over brixham.

content.detailedDescription:
Every night i go out  into my backyard and sit in my spa to star gaze, meditate and relax. the night of my first sighting i was laying back soaking observing the clear sky  and marveling over how many stars i could see when all of a sudden i observed a bright orb appear from out of nowhere. it seemed to of just dropped in from a portal in the sky then it shot east. although it was only a matter of a split second i knew this wasn't a shooting star, aircraft, flare or comet because it was way to close and it moved deliberately and naturally unlike anything man made.  after the sighting i sat there a little long contemplating what i had just saw and grappling with the possibilities of what it could be and where it came from. i was compelled to go inside and wake my wife but i didn't want to freighter her so i just waited until the next morning to tell her. i told my sister about my experience and she advised me to report it to you but i didn't get around to it and just dismissed it as a coincident.

i went out to my yard the following night and had a very relaxing soak without incident or encounter  but i definitely had the experience in the forefront of my mind. then the following night i did my same routine, i went out to my yard and got in my spa and soaked for a good hour and a half, again observing the night sky, marveling at the beauty of the stars. i wasn't really thinking about what had happened a few nights prior so it was just another pleasant evening to me but just before i started to exit the spa  just around the same time i do every night (11:30), when i looked up and another bright orb traveled across the sky from left to right giving me a chance to really observe what it was. at first i thought it may have been a flare but it move unlike fireworks or a projectile and it didn't arch either. it went straight across the sky, in clear sight, only a few hundred feet above me headed south this time, silent and it was almost angelic. needless to say i was stunned and i again grappled with what i had just witnessed. i attempted to rationalize the incident  and i called my sister immediately following, waking her up to tell her about my second sighting in less then a week. she again told me to report it to you but again i procrastinated. after waking up with this on my mind i thought it would be best to tell you my experience and allow you experts the opportunity to decipher the situation. i am open and receptive to an interview and would be glad to show anyone in your organization where i witnessed this sighting so please feel free to contact me. 

thank you
content.summary: I witnessed 2 bright orbs above my house on 2 separate occasions this week

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in hot tub out back saw a hovering craft between hills and tree line.  it hovered for about 1-2 minutes, ascended slightly then after about 2 minutes took off west towards hocking college quickly.  second one appeared right after went in same direction.  but path was semi random.  son saw outline of disc object with a bright aura like light around it and red white and blue pulsating lights.  

about 4 hours later a neighbor near hocking college reported three hovering around the horse barn and river over by the college.  same light description.

my kitchen light was flickering off and on and never has before or after since event.  me and my two kids all saw the same thing.  as well as a neighbor near hocking college less than a mile away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw two craft, first one hovered then went west directional after ascending.  second one flew 40 sec. later same direction as first

content.detailedDescription:
1. my friend was out getting fresh air in front of his house. still waiting to find out what time he was out there observing the strange light.
2. the light in the sky was fading and getting extremely bright.
3. he thought the light was an airplane. 
4. the light barely moved and became intense in brightness.
5. he was extremely "weirded" out by seeing it so he took a video. now he's out every night looking in the same direction looking for "something". 
6. he went back into the house to get show the family his video.
content.summary: A bright starlike object in towards the west over falconer, ny

content.detailedDescription: Me and my sister were sleeping in the same bed later that morning i'll say around 2am me and my sister were woken up by a violent earthquake to the point where it blocked the door with our dresser on top of carpet wich is almost impossaible to do on carpet sliding but i watched it slide me and my sister were screaming and squeezing each other she's 7 years older after the shaking stopped my mom and her boyfriend immediately came to our room trying to gain entry but couldn't for a few seconds because of the dresser blocking the door on carpet mind you james was very strong after he got in we ran out of the room and i remember walking to the window and asking everyone did they see what i was seeing wich was the craft hovering directly over the house with colors going in a circle the craft was no larger than the house we were living in at the time when i looked at everyone it seemed as if they were in slow motion and i got no response ever since then we've talked about it and thru research we found that no earthquake of that magnitude happened in that area during that time i need your help
content.summary: After an undocumented earthquake me and my sister experienced i noticed it directly over the house yet everyone else didn't notice it and it was like slow motion i was 4 now i'm 37 yrs old and i know it wasn't a dream

content.detailedDescription: i took a picture of the super moon on august 9, 2014 and then noticed the blue dot. then, on august 15, 2014, a friend of mine showed me a picture containing the same type of blue dot. both were taken in the same neighborhood on different days, different times, and with different cameras.
content.summary: Two separate photos taken by two different people.

content.detailedDescription:
my husband and i were in our front yard watching the persieds meteor shower between 10:00 and 10:30 p.M. on tuesday, august 12, 2014.  we had a pair of binoculars with us to see the stars better.  i walked inside the house for a moment when i heard my husband yelling my name in an urgent manner so i ran back outside and he was looking up at the sky in northwest direction.  i looked up and saw a red light low in the sky, moving slowly from north to south directly over a house about 4 houses down.  as it came into my view, a second light was directly behind it.  the distance between the two lights was about four times the distance of the length of a helicopter.  as i watched, a third red light came on next to the second red light making a shape of a triangle. 
     the first thing i noticed was there was how huge the object was. i had never seen anything even close to this size; it was enormous.  i also noticed there was no sound at all.  the object was extremely low so it was odd that it was completely silent.  as soon as i realized this was no ordinary object, i called for my son who also came running outside and witnessed this as well.  i had the binoculars at the time so i watched the object through the binoculars for the remainder of the sighting.  
     i could see that the three lights were large red spheres on the bottom of the craft and there were much smaller rectangular white lights along the side of the craft that flashed on in a sequence.  as i watched through the binoculars all three red lights stayed on at once for a short time and then one of them turned off but i could still see the sphere, it was dark grey or black.  all of a sudden all of the spheres turned white at the same time for a couple seconds and then two of the lights turned off while only one white light remained.  i could still see the spheres with the binoculars, but when i looked at the object without the binoculars i could only see the white light.  at this point the object appeared to be an ordinary aircraft with my naked eyes. we continued to watch the object for a few minutes until it was too far to see anymore.  we looked down our road and noticed there were other people outside, so my husband walked down there and spoke to them.  one of them had said she saw the object as well. 
     this experience was very exciting, so my husband and i have been going out to watch the skies each night since this experience.  i made sure to have a camera nearby, just in case we see it again.  last night around the same time some odd lights flew directly overhead very low.  they looked like they could have been from a huge airplane, but they made no sound at all.  i got these lights on video.
content.summary: Triangle or stingray shaped object three spheres at each corner.  the spheres had red lights that blinked on and off and then they turned white at one point. there were smaller white lights that flashed in a sequence along the side of the craft.

content.detailedDescription: Whilst out walking on the beach at llanddulas at a approx 7am i had stopped to watch some sea birds diving down into the water about 30 metres off the shoreline. as i watched a weird solid structure appeared in the sky above them to the north and moved slowly towards the beach. i thought at first it was a balloon but it was very solid and metal looking. i quickly grabbed my mobile phone and took a picture of it as it turned left and moved in an easterly direction. it looked like it had a pair of dipped wings or something hanging down from it on each side, but it was also a bit pointed at the front. it made a slight humming sound and it had white and blue lights that seemed to glow or pulsate. as it turned to the east they changed to a yellow colour. i would say that i watched it for approx 90 seconds and as it move down the coastline i did seem to change shape slightly. it then just disappeared about a mile away from my position on the beach. there were a couple on the beach who may have saw this too because they walked behind me as i was watching it. i think they were foreign though because they were quite tanned and spoke to each other with an accent so i didn't say anything to them. i am familiar with aircraft and this was 100% no helicopter or fixed wing craft! and certainly no weather balloon because this was moving in a controlled manner.
content.summary: Strange structured object moving in controlled manner over shoreline

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach in kona, just across the street from the veterans cemetery, taking pictures of the larger than normal waves. later when putting the photos on my computer i noticed the ufo in one of the pictures i took. please tell me what it is if you can figure it out.
content.summary: I was taking pictures of the larger than normal waves and saw ufo when looking at pictures on computer.

content.detailedDescription:
We stopped on us 285 west in colorado so my friend could urinate on the side of the rode. he saw a black object against the clouds. he alerted myself and we watched the object for about 5 minutes. the object was slowing moving at around 20-30 mph at what we estimate at about 2000-3000 feet. this would make the object around 100 feet in diameter.

 we left after about 5 minutes because we were 45 minutes from home and freaked out.
content.summary: Blackberry sphere 2000-3000  feet above us moving at 20mph below cloud cover

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was weird my son age 9 fiance 51 and  myself 30 all witnessed this strange event i saw on your hotspot chart map numerous other sightings in our area i honestly do not have the time to explain more at this moment my son is tired and needs to go to bed u can contact us if need be oh i first called this hotline for sightings a 206 area code number and the last four numbers were 3000 i can try to find the remaing 3 numbers but at first this guy was nice then i told him what i saw then he started to get short with me i told him in 15 seconds or less what i saw and my city and provence he asked if their were witnesses then he got very rude i said  he didn't have to talk to me that way and he then said we don't deal with ontario and i said well it was a canada wide phone centre then he hung up i honestly have to get to my son im trying to rush this just contact me and my family if you have furthur questions or concerns thank u good
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My son 9 my fiance 51 and myself 30 saw with bonoculors a white yellow red flashing light  objects coming and going it moved every way possible

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were walking outside at night on a college campus trail that is lighted at night. we had just finished walking and were sitting on the grass resting and talking. i noticed a few airplanes flying throgh the area a couple of times; however, there is an airport not too far away. we got in the car to leave, and as i was leaving the parking lot, i noticed directly in the sky looking towards the north, 3 orange fireball looking objects in the sky. we didn't hear any sound; they seemed to just glide through the air moving towards the east in formation. they would suddenly form a triangular formation, and then they would just kind of float apart. right away we noticed that this was something that we have never seen before. at first i thought maybe they were airplanes, but right away as we watched them move in the sky, you could tell that they were not airplanes as airplanes can't move around like these objects were moving. i stopped the car to take some photos with my iphone camera. we kept watching, and kept asking each other what do you think this is? neither one of us could figure out what these objects were, where they came from, how were they moving like they were in the sky? i turned the car around to go back into the parking lot to keep watching. they kept moving towards the east. there was a man and woman stopped on the trail looking up in the sky so we rode up to where they were and asked if they were looking at the objects and if they knew what they were. they both said they had no idea what the objects could be, and they seemed to be baffled as much as we were. then the objects just kind of disappeared. they were gliding along one moment and then all of a sudden they were gone. we didn't see them descending to land, or flying into the opposite direction, they just disappeared.
content.summary: 3 glowing objexts in the sky that seemed to float in the sky but would change formations rapidly

content.detailedDescription: My 2 children flew me from new mexico to florida for fathers day for a reunion. my son owns a time share. we stayed at a resort in ruskin, fl. on thursday they went to a water park, i stayed in alone, fished a little and swam, i went out onto the balcony on the 3rd floor to watch the manatys, boats, girls, whatever. st. petersburg is about 15 deg. north of west from there, 10 miles across the bay, clearly visible. tampa 15 miles about 80 degrees north of west, again clearly visible from the balcony. and i saw 'it'. like a black shoe box, north of st pete but not as far. there was a rain cloud between it and st. pete, and a rain cloud between it and tampa to the north. the kind of localized cloud where you can see the rain falling. i said to my self "holy s**t". i was looking and scanning everywhere, "they cant see it from tampa or st. pete". it just sat there in the sky, i noted the time, looked inside and saw both of my kids cameras gone, still there hovering, i picked up my cell phone and took several pictures (not very good)i tried to estimate its size, comparing it to the tallest building in st. pete,. it looked to be twice the size of the tallest building i could see. i knew it wasn't as far away, but it was big. it hovered for about 20 minutes (i kept checking my watch). as the rain between it and st pete started to let up it moved in a straight line away from me and climbed, that only took a few seconds and was gone. i was beside my self, "that wasn't one of ours" i knew it, and in broad daylight this time. i know what i saw, i didn't imagine it. i made a sketch right after to show my kids what i saw. it was better than christmas when i was 5 years old. i am 60 years old now, an ase certified master mechanic, iso certified machinist, was a peace corps volunteer 1979-1981 attended unm at los alamos, nm. a widower, yea i'm weird (who isn't) but i'm not crazy. i had a very close encounter in 1975 with my brother and a friend where something huge blocked out the stars right over us, i shined my 1 million candle power spot light on it, it was just black but the light was on something, they actually started crying with fear. the next thing i remember we were back in my truck and the sun was coming up, it was just after midnight when we saw 'whatever it was' we lost 5 hours. have been a confused believer ever since. my main reason i cannot accept 'organized' religeon. i am including 1 of the pictures i took with my cell phone, it's bad i know, the others are no better, if not worse.

I was standing by the window that overlooks the rear of our home.  i was suddenly drawn to look up - i saw a spherical brilliant white object almost directly overhead.  i felt mesmerized by it and wanted to get my husband but was thinking it would go away.  i waited several seconds and ran to get my husband who was in the other end of the house in the front sitting room.  i called out to him to come and see the object.  by the time he got to the window it had moved from above the house towards the east.  i told him to run and get his iphone to get a picture - he ran and got his iphone, leaned back out the window but the object was moving very fast at this point so we ran to the back door and he took a picture.  we have two pictures.  one of the pictures does not seem to resemble the object we physically saw, rather than the bright sphere, the picture shows what looks like the side view of some craft - a long line with some shadows to the top and bottom.  it reminds me of a kids old fashioned spinning top. the second picture looks like the bright object we saw.  but as soon as my husband started to take pictures that's when it seemed to move away even faster.  we were not sure if it was going up or coming down - my husband stated 'it's coming down' and he was going to take another picture but it suddenly seemed to get very small very fast and then it disappeared - i think it went up actually because it got small and disappeared.  this object was a similar object to one we saw a couple of weeks ago in the same place over our house.  that object appeared from the south and came right over us.  on that occasion we were both standing outside of our house and looking up in the sky, we saw what we thought was a star but it was moving very fast, then a large bright white spherical light suddenly appeared underneath it.  to give you some idea of the size and the change in size, when we first saw the 'star' to give some comparison, it was tiny, like the size of a tiny star in the sky, but when we saw the bright light, the spherical light, the size of the star changed to about the size of a football. it was directly above us.  then the light disappeared and the star reappeared then that disappeared, then the object quickly changed to a different position and then the light appeared again and then disappeared again.  then it disappeared.  there was no sound then, just like tonight.  no sounds.   as to our feelings and reactions from a couple of weeks ago, we both felt awe and still feel this about that incident, this evening we both felt questioning. we also both feel that the object is familiar even though we don't know what it was and we both have a feeling of expectation that we will see it again. we plan to stay up this evening and watch out for it in case it comes back.
content.summary: Intensely bright round sphere traveling at great speed first saw above our house then it flew fast towards the east

content.detailedDescription: I was driving northbound on i-95 between the massachusetts border and the hampton tolls just south of seabrook, new hampshire at a speed of ~75 mph.  an object entered my field of vision at approximately 2 o'clock (nne) at 60 degrees above the horizon.  the silvery blue glowing object travelled at a very low rate of speed in the same direction as i was driving for a few seconds. the object flew at a speed slightly greater than my vehicle, around 100 mph.  i estimated the size of the this object to be the size of a pencil eraser held at arm's length.  then the object accelerated and changed direction to the nnw across the eight lane highway.  then the object simply vanished.  the amount of time that had passed was approximately 6 - 7 seconds. this location of the highway is in close proximity to the seabrook nuclear power station.
content.summary: Driving northbound on i95 when an object approximately 800' high entered my field of view

content.detailedDescription:
1: i stood on my balcony to witness some of the fireworks launched taht night because it was august 1. in switzerland which is a national day like july 4. in the usa.

2: the object just came in view during the time i watched the fireworks go off.

3: i thought it may be fireworks or an airplane (i live in the landing corridor of zurich airport which is approx. 50km from my location.) but i realized it traveled to fast for firework or an airplane and it did not looked like anything i have witnessed around the airport before.

4: it was an orange orb (?) looked like a bright star in the sky. it traveled in a straight line across the sky and through some clouds. the sky was cloudy so it was easy to tell that it was at cloud altitude.

5: i got the feeling that it was not fireworks or an airplane. it was to quick to grab a camera or something so i continued as nothing had happend.

6: i lost sight of it because it traveled across the sky and disappeared behind another house across the street from my viewpoint.
content.summary: Orang orb like a star in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Saw three lights in the sky- no noise just hoovered. couldn't really tell how high or what craft looked like or what kind of craft it was. suddenly flew away at an odd angle away from me straight up and away at angle.
content.summary: Saw three lights in the sky- no noise just hoovered. couldn't tell how high or what craft looked like. suddenly flew away at an odd angle away from me.

content.detailedDescription: Watched for about 30 min. i was on my deck i just looked out nw and saw an object  with lights flashing colored lights it just stayed in one place. it appeared to be flat with a dome on top. but it never moved. i had to go to bed. it did make me feel calm.
content.summary: Just random flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I woke and felt like my body from the head down was tingling like it was falling asleep. it was so intense it hurt but went down my whole body then back up.. i screamed then sat up and seen a very tall (grey)? with backwards legs like a grasshopper .  about 8- 9 feet because i know my tv height above my fireplace, he was in my bedroom.  he was walking towards my bedroom patio door but stopped and looked at me, almost like he was angry i seen him.  he looked frustrated and in a hurry then looked at me like i did something wrong.... then just gone and i snapped up again in bed sweating and heart raising... i know it wasn't a dream, i know i felt it and seen it and i'm positive it was not a dream.
content.summary: I woke and felt like my body from the head down was tingling like it was falling asleep. it was so intense it hurt but went down my whole body then back up.. i screamed then sat up and seen a very tall (grey)? with backwards legs like a grasshopper .
